title: Sleepless in Seattle 1.45 GB AVI many languages
description:
You shouldn&#039;t have to DL almost 6 GB just for one movie, but that was all that was available, and it was PAL and I&#039;m in the US.  So I downloaded this:
 <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3981312/Sleepless.in.Seattle.DVDR.Multisub-elements" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3981312/Sleepless.in.Seattle.DVDR.Multisub-elements</a>

ripped it to AVI using AutoGK and now it&#039;s a 1.45 GB with all audio tracks and external subtitles intact.  It even has subs that TPB doesn&#039;t list as options, like Greek, Hindi & Hebrew.
